mapper.select: select * from SALARY_REPORT_CONFIG where site = #{site} and tab_id = #{tabId} order by id

select t1.ID, t1.STAGE,t2.label as SITE,t1.DEPART_NAME,t1.SORT,t1.TAB_ID from SALARY_REPORT_CONFIG t1 left join (select DEPART_CODE,DEPART_NAME as label,DEPARTID,PARENTCODE as pid , CONCAT(CONCAT(DEPART_CODE,'_'),PARENTCODE) as value from hrp_fst.AD_DEPART_V@hr_test where status='N' and DEPART_NAME is not null) t2 on t1.site=t2.DEPART_CODE ${ew.customSqlSegment} order by t1.tab_id,t1.sort
SELECT COUNT(STAGE) STAGENUMBER,STAGE FROM SALARY_REPORT_CONFIG where TAB_ID = #{tabId} AND SITE =#{site} GROUP BY STAGE
